about_the_game:
Chained-2-Violence throws you and a friend into a chaotic, gladiatorial fight for survival—where teamwork isn't just important, it’s chained to your success. Bound together by a single, unbreakable chain, you’ll battle relentless waves of enemies, adapt to evolving arenas, and unleash devastating chain-based abilities. The key? Stay in sync, or face brutal consequences. From ancient Rome to futuristic wastelands, each era transforms the battlefield with unique enemies, challenges, and over-the-top physics-driven chaos. Will you master the chain and overcome the odds, or succumb to the violence?

         

  • Chained Co-Op Gameplay: Team up and use your chain creatively to overcome challenges.

  • 4 Unique Classes: Tank, Warrior, Ranged, and Support, each with specialized abilities.

  • Dynamic Arenas Across Eras: Battle through 7 distinct eras with evolving environments and enemies.

  • Ultimate Chain Powers: Unleash game-changing abilities like Laser Chain and Fire Chain.

  • Endless Waves, Infinite Challenge: Survive procedurally generated waves with escalating difficulty.

  • Rogue-lite Progression: Upgrade stats, unlock perks, and grow stronger after each defeat.

  • Chaotic Physics and Ragdoll Fun: Enjoy over-the-top animations and unpredictable mayhem.

  • Solo or Co-Op: Play with a partner or go solo for a bold challenge.

Will You Break Free or Break Apart? The arena awaits. Grab your partner, master the chain, and fight your way through time in this brutal co-op roguelike.

         

We're a small team of students based in Sweden that have a passion for games! This started as a project in our course and we wanted to expand it, later releasing it here on steam! We hope you like it! :)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64) - Windows 11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel 2nd gen
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 560
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64) - Windows 11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel 5th gen and above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1050
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
